SELECT COUNT(a.ID) AS COUNT,DATETIME,WH_CODE FROM (SELECT to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyyMMdd') AS DATETIME,ID,WH_CODE FROM ECBOSS_LDO WHERE CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode# AND CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd'))
WH_CODE=#wareHouseCodeList[]#
) a
JOIN ( SELECT LDO_ID FROM ECBOSS_LDO_ITEM WHERE SKU_CODE=#skuCode# AND CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd')) ) b ON a.ID=b.LDO_ID
GROUP BY WH_CODE,DATETIME

SELECT COUNT(a.ID) AS COUNT,DATETIME,PROVINCE FROM (SELECT to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyyMMdd') AS DATETIME,ID,CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE as PROVINCE FROM ECBOSS_LDO WHERE CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode# AND CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd')) ) a
JOIN ( SELECT LDO_ID FROM ECBOSS_LDO_ITEM WHERE SKU_CODE=#skuCode# AND CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd')) ) b ON a.ID=b.LDO_ID
GROUP BY PROVINCE,DATETIME

SELECT a.ID AS ID,b.SKU_CODE as SKUCODE,to_char(a.CREATE_TIME,'yyyyMMdd') AS DATETIME FROM ECBOSS_LDO a JOIN ECBOSS_LDO_ITEM b ON a.ID=b.LDO_ID AND a.ID IN (
SELECT ID FROM (SELECT ID FROM ECBOSS_LDO WHERE CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode# AND CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd')) ) a JOIN ( SELECT LDO_ID FROM ECBOSS_LDO_ITEM WHERE CREATE_TIME>=to_date(#startTime#,'yyyyMMdd') AND CREATE_TIME<=(to_date(#endTime#,'yyyyMMdd'))
SKU_CODE=#skuCode#
) b ON a.ID=b.LDO_ID )
